metadata.title: CVE-2021-47017 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:ath10k: Fix a use after free in ath10k_htc_send_bundleIn ath10k_htc_send_bundle, the bundle_skb could be freed bydev_kfree_skb_any(bundle_skb). But the bundle_skb is used laterby bundle_skb->len.As skb_len = bundle_skb->len, my patch replaces bundle_skb->len toskb_len after the bundle_skb was freed.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
